column4: I have a notebook Fujitsu Siemens Amilo Pro v2030, I've install Ubuntu 7.04, but I heve problems whith my video card. My video - VIA Unicrome PRO IGP integrated 64mb. Does anyone know what's problem and how may I install driwers on my video??

I have a notebook Fujitsu Siemens Amilo Pro v2030, I've install Ubuntu 7.04, but I heve problems whith my video card. My video - VIA Unicrome PRO IGP integrated 64mb. Does anyone know what's problem and how may I install driwers on my video??
welcome to the world of via! i am using same thing. can u pls find the serial no. by System->Admin->Hardware Drivers and tell me?
pls tell me the exact model of ur card
